Plot: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.
Title: Catwoman
Writer: Bob Kane (characters), Theresa Rebeck (story), John Brancato (story), Michael Ferris (story), John Brancato (screenplay), Michael Ferris (screenplay), John Rogers (screenplay)
Actors: Halle Berry, Benjamin Bratt, Sharon Stone, Lambert Wilson
